articles.title: In Farewell Speech For Veep, Trinamool's Derek O'Brien's Swipe At Centre
articles.description: Derek O'Brien during his farewell speech for outgoing M Venkaiah Naidu in the Rajya Sabha took a swipe at Prime Minister Narendra Modi saying Mr Naidu would have tried hard to get the Prime Minister to perhaps answer one question in his full tenure.
articles.content:
The farewell in the upper house of Parliament was attended by several top leaders. (file)
